name: Last Embers
description:
Fire Duo Games:

David Daraban(FDG),Keldon Israel(Paradox VFX)  and Joshua Carter  submission for Ludum Dare 46

Theme: Keep it alive

To win the game, survive for 300 seconds, and create a slab to and add it to the campfire

Controls:

WASD - movement

E - interact (fuel fire, drink water, eat food)

Z - Drop item

F - pickup Item

C - Crafting menu

Esc - pause game
